description.full: From the writers and producers of The Simpsons TV show comes perhaps the most mind-blowingly astounding video game experience to ever grace the disc drive of your Xbox 360 console. Your eyes will explode with delight as they witness, for the first time ever in a video game, new 3D-to-2D technology that delivers the actual look of the TV show. Your spleen will rupture with laughter as The Simpsons take aim at the video game industry with all their trademark humor. Your colon will sigh with relief as your friends drop in and out of your game at any time to lend assistance in co-op mode. It’s like a party in your organs and all Springfield is invited when you play through a brand-new season of The Simpsons not available anywhere else!
